title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Castagnola's
directions: across from Ripley's and the Wax Museum, and the nearby Ghirardelli Square
content: Voted San Franciscoâ€™s No. 1 Seafood and Family Restaurant of 1998 by The National Academy of Restaurant Evaluation and The Best of San Francisco Pocket Guide. They specialize in seafood and Italian cuisine, complimented by quality Californian wines.
